sounds.incompatability.title: Incompatability Detected
sounds.incompatability.message:
It appears that both the §lQualitySounds§r and §lSounds§r mods are installed.

§lPlease uninstall the QualitySounds mod, as the Sounds mod already includes all of its sound effects and functionalities.

Keeping both mods installed will cause conflicts with Sounds' mixins, leading to sound duplications and other potential issues and crashes.§r

§lSounds§r is fully feature-complete with everything offered by QualitySounds and even more customizable.§r

With §lSounds§r, you can modify place, fall, break, and step sounds for blocks that have been given custom sound effects, including modifying their pitch and volume, features which QualitySounds lacks.
sounds.config.title: Sounds Ayarları
sounds.config.preview.name: Sesi Önizle
sounds.config.play.error.title: Ses oynatılamadı.
sounds.config.play.error.description: "%s" sesini oynatmaya çalışırken bir hata oluştu. Ses etkinlik tanımlayıcısının doğru olduğundan emin misiniz?
sounds.config.preview.error.title: Önizlenemedi
sounds.config.preview.error.description: Ses efektini önizlemeye çalışırken bir hata oluştu. Ses etkinlik tanımlayıcısının doğru olduğundan emin misiniz?
sounds.config.tag.description: Bu etikete sahip herhangi bir bloğun, block ses grubuna bu ayarlar uygulanacaktır.
sounds.config.shouldPlay.name: Sesi Aktifleştir
sounds.config.dynamic.name: Dinamik Sesler
sounds.config.dynamic.description:
Oynatılacak ses şuanda yapılan etkinliğe göre mi belirlenmeli=?

Eşyalar ve Bloklar için, eşyanın/bloğun materyaline göre sesler oynatılacak.
sounds.config.volume.name: Ses Miktarı
sounds.config.pitch.name: Ses Perdesi
sounds.config.pitch.description:
Sesin perdesi.

Düşük bir perde derin bir ses verirken, yüksek bir perde daha ince bir ses verir.
sounds.config.event.name: Ses Etkinlik Tanımlayıcısı
sounds.config.event.description:
Ses tetiklendiğinde çalınan ses etkinlik tanımlayıcısı.

Ses etkinliği için kullanılan farklı bir tanımlayıcıdır ve oyunda sesleri oynatmak için kullanılır
sounds.config.repeaterUse.name: Yineleyici Aralığını Değiştirme
sounds.config.repeaterUse.description: Kızıltaş Yineleyicisi ile etkileşime geçiğinde oluşan ses.
sounds.config.jukeboxUse.name: Müzik kutusu disk yerleştirme/çıkarma
sounds.config.jukeboxUse.description: Nüzik kutusuna disk yerleştirdiğinde yada yerleştirdiğinde oynatılan ses.
sounds.config.daylightDetectorUse.name: Gün Işığı Algılayıcısının Modunu Değiştir
sounds.config.daylightDetectorUse.descri: A sound effect that is played when you interact with a Daylight Detector to change it's detection mode.
sounds.config.furnaceMinecartFuel.name: Furnace Minecart Fuel
sounds.config.furnaceMinecartFuel.descri: A sound effect that is played when you fuel a Furnace Minecart.
sounds.config.enableEnderpearlVariety.de: Should the sound effect that is played when you throw an Ender Pearl be randomized and more consistent with the chorus fruit teleport sound?
sounds.config.frostWalker.name: Frost Walker Freeze
sounds.config.frostWalker.description: The sound effect that plays when frost walker boots freeze water.
sounds.config.leadSnapping.name: Lead Snapping
sounds.config.leadSnapping.description: The sound effect that plays when a lead is snapped off of a mob.
sounds.config.bowPull.name: Bow Pull
sounds.config.bowPull.description: A sound effect that is played when you pull back a bow.
sounds.config.plantPotFill.name: Plant Pot Fill
sounds.config.plantPotFill.description: A sound effect that is played when you fill a flower pot with a plant.
sounds.config.cakeEat.name: Cake Eat
sounds.config.cakeEat.description: A sound effect that is played when you eat a slice of cake. The cake may be a lie, but the sound isn't!
sounds.config.babyChickenChirp.name: Baby Chicken Chirp
sounds.config.babyChickenChirp.descripti: A sound effect that is played when a baby chicken chirps.
sounds.config.wolfHowling.name: Wolf Howling
sounds.config.wolfHowling.description: A sound effect that is played by wolves when a full moon is out... beware !
sounds.config.world.blocks.description:
These sounds are categorized and applied based on tags, offering a flexible and customizable experience.
It is recommended to use the search bar when locating sounds.
For a full list of what blocks are in which tags, you should click the following button:
sounds.config.ignoreEmptyHotbarSlots.des:
Should empty hotbar slots be ignored when playing sound effects?

Note: This does NOT include the hotbar drop sound effect due to the weird mojank implementation of item dropping mechanics. You should toggle the 'Ignore Empty Inventory Slots' option for that.
sounds.config.inventoryOpen.name: Inventory Open
sounds.config.inventoryOpen.description: A sound effect that is played when you open a screen that has an inventory, such as an enchanting table.
sounds.config.inventoryScroll.name: Inventory Scroll
sounds.config.inventoryScroll.descriptio: A sound effect that is played when you use a scrollbar in any inventory.
sounds.config.inventoryClose.name: Inventory Close
sounds.config.inventoryClose.description: A sound effect that is played when you close a screen that has an inventory, such as an enchanting table.
sounds.config.inventoryTyping.name: Inventory Typing
sounds.config.inventoryTyping.descriptio: A sound effect that is played when you type into the anvil name bar or creative inventory search bar.
sounds.config.hotbarScroll.name: Hotbar Scroll
sounds.config.hotbarScroll.description: A sound effect that is played when you scroll through your hotbar or use the number keys to select a hotbar slot.
sounds.config.hotbarPick.name: Pick Block
sounds.config.hotbarPick.description: A sound effect that is played when you use the 'Pick Block' action.
Should empty inventory slots be ignored when playing sound effects?

Note: This includes the hotbar drop sound effect due to the weird mojank implementation of item dropping mechanics.
sounds.config.itemCopy.name: Item Clone
sounds.config.itemCopy.description: A sound effect that is played when you clone an item in your inventory.
sounds.config.itemDelete.name: Item Delete
sounds.config.itemDelete.description: A sound effect that is played when you delete an item using the bin/garbage can in the creative inventory.
sounds.config.itemDrop.name: Item Drop
sounds.config.itemDrop.description: A sound effect that is played when you drop an item from your inventory.
sounds.config.itemDrag.name: Item Drag
sounds.config.itemDrag.description: A sound effect that is played when you drag an item across slots in your inventory.
sounds.config.itemPick.name: Item Click
sounds.config.itemPick.description: A sound effect that is played when you click on an item in your inventory.
sounds.config.mentionKeywords.name: Mention Keywords
sounds.config.mentionKeywords.descriptio: A list of keywords that will trigger a mention sound effect when mentioned in chat.
sounds.config.ignoreSystemChats.name: Ignore System Messages
sounds.config.ignoreSystemChats.descript: Should system messages be ignored in the chat when playing sound effects?
sounds.config.typing.name: Chat Typing
sounds.config.typing.description: A sound effect that is played when you type or remove characters from the chat input bar.
sounds.config.message.name: Chat Messages
sounds.config.message.description: A sound effect that is played when you receive a message in the chat.
sounds.config.mention.name: Chat Mentions
sounds.config.mention.description: A sound effect that is played when you are mentioned in a new chat message.
sounds.config.enableChatSoundCooldown.de: Should a cooldown be applied to chat sounds? If enabled, the sound will only be played once within every cooldown period. This does not apply to typing sounds.
sounds.config.chatSoundCooldown.name: Cooldown Period
sounds.config.chatSoundCooldown.descript: The cooldown period for chat sounds, in seconds. This does not apply to typing sounds.
sounds.config.events.ignoreSilencedStatu: Should status effects that have been silenced (no HUD icon) be ignored when playing sound effects?
sounds.config.positiveStatusEffectGain.d: A sound effect that is played when you gain a positive status effect.
sounds.config.positiveStatusEffectLose.d: A sound effect that is played when you lose a positive status effect.
sounds.config.negativeStatusEffectGain.d: A sound effect that is played when you gain a negative status effect.
sounds.config.negativeStatusEffectLose.d: A sound effect that is played when you lose a negative status effect.
